SDL Trados Studio 2009 SP3 Freelance is the ultimate translation software, providing all the tools you need to edit and review high quality translations. 

Based on leading translation memory technology used by over 80% of the translation supply chain (including corporations, translation agencies and freelance translators), SDL Trados Studio can help you complete translations up to 40% faster*! Depending on the content being translated, this figure could increase further.
--------------------
SDL Trados Studio 2009 brought you a host of revolutionary features to help you translate faster and more easily; Studio 2011 will continue the journey of innovation to advance your translation experience and transform your review process.

Follow us over the course of the next few weeks as we will be unveiling some of the fantastic Studio 2011 highlights. At each station, announced via our timetable, we will be showcasing a new feature or capability. Plus, at each stop you will be able to watch sneak peek videos of the new software. 

A preview of what's coming include:

Review made easy
Same look - Great new features
Continued innovation
The details that matter
----------------------------------------------
